synopsis.text: Kaede, a trendy and fashion-forward gal, finds herself in an unexpected living situation after a wild night out. She wakes up to discover a dinosaur in her home, a creature she unintentionally brought back the previous night. Despite the initial shock, Kaede decides to embrace her new reality and begins cohabiting with the prehistoric creature. The dinosaur, although unable to speak, shows signs of intelligence and a peculiar fondness for human activities such as watching TV, eating instant ramen, and appreciating fashionable items. As they navigate through daily life together, Kaede learns more about her unusual roommate through a series of comedic and heartwarming experiences. This unique tale of friendship transcends time, offering a fresh perspective on what it means to live together in harmony.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
